name: Craft ADV Endur Graphic Jersey - Women's
description:
Whether you’re a Watt watcher or a weekend warrior, Craft’s Advanced line will keep you cool while chasing that next PR. Constructed of multiple fabrics, the Endur jersey perfectly balances comfort, breathability and performance.Body mapped construction puts a breathable mesh on the upper back, inside sleeves and side panels.Light polyester blends have a supportive 4-way stretch and wick away moisture.Full length zipper offers easy venting.3 back drop-in pockets fit a light windbreaker, some tools and a handful of gels.1 small zippered pocket for valuables.Dropped hem provides coverage.Silicone grips at back hem keeps the jersey in place.Craft fits long and lean. If you're between sizes, Craft suggests sizing up.

        Sustainability
